title: Strengthening Deep Learning Practical Competencies: Cultural Intelligence Through Collaborative Online International Learning (COIL)

context.prior_knowledge: Expert-level knowledge and experience in solving complex problems
context.additional_context: Advanced AI/machine learning technical course for AI/ML practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can analyze how personality traits (e.g., conscientiousness, openness) influence team dynamics when designing intercultural collaboration projects in COIL environments.
Learners can evaluate and improve conflict management strategies in intercultural collaboration using mixed research methods (quantitative/qualitative data).
Learners can effectively collaborate on science content with international team members in resource-limited settings (smartphone-centric environments).

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
